mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure that all interactive elements are fully touch-friendly on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and reduce server response time to improve speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more internal links and enhance content relevance for specific queries.
userExperienceTip: Improve the navigation menu for faster access to key sections.
bookingFlowTip: Provide more visual feedback during the booking process to improve user confidence.
